review:
i have seen this movie more than 50 times in the past 15 yrs.
the making is superb.
sunny deol tabu anupam kher reema sen amrish puri acting is fantastic.
action scenes are just awesome.

the first half portraying sunny deol and amrish puri is so very good and emotional and even funny.

later half very intense and superb . too good.
yes superb movie. enjoy the thrill, action and acting by sunny deol, amrish puri, tabu and mukesh rishi.
my favorite action and comedy movie songs  loved sona sona soniye ni ropda najara
this is the best movie because sunny and anita did good acting
very very nice film jaal tabu is good acting super hit movies

nice... gripping... fast...movie..full.of action..
with nice acting..by the stars.

good and suspense story.
sunny deol good work.
this movie is very interesting. i saw fifth time this movie
very nice and action more movie...jay hind,bande matram
a good & remarkable film
superb movie
dashing sunny bhaji
